definition: to shoot flames/to erupt (of volcanoes)/flaming (of flowers)
(of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Bubble lesions, plaque denudation , crater-shaped pits, reduced or disappeared microtriches on the surface of cysts were observed using scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电镜可见蚴囊表面呈斑块状剥蚀及喷火口样凹陷。

sentences.english: Dragons are terrifying and awe-inspiring as they take wing and breathe fire .
sentences.chinese: 在它们飞行和喷火的时候，龙是很可怕和令人敬畏的。

sentences.english: He looked up and he saw a fire-breathing dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头一看，他看到了喷火龙。

sentences.english: Immediately plug these agile flame-spewing vehicles into the gaps you're defending.
sentences.chinese: 马上把这些灵活的喷火车辆派到防守路口。

sentences.english: High-pressure fire injection burning system, Automatic temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 高压喷火燃烧系统，温度自动控制。

sentences.english: Flame Turrets to gain a flamethrower weapon.
sentences.chinese: 能够拆除喷火塔以得到喷火武器。

sentences.english: Flame Turrets to gain a flamethrower weapon.
sentences.chinese: 能够拆除喷火塔以得到喷火武器。

sentences.english: Garg doesn't like people invading his space.
sentences.chinese: 喷火怪可不喜欢别人侵犯它的空间。

sentences.english: he would fly low, intentionally backfiring the plane and frightening away the hunters.
sentences.chinese: 他会飞得很低，故意让飞机尾部喷火，吓跑猎手。

sentences.english: Can cannibalize Flame Turrets to gain a flamethrower weapon.
sentences.chinese: 能够拆除喷火塔以得到喷火武器。

sentences.english: Can cannibalize Flame Turrets to gain a flamethrower weapon.
sentences.chinese: 能够拆除喷火塔以得到喷火武器。

sentences.english: The Tartars employed another weapon, the so-called Chinese dragon belching fire.
sentences.chinese: 鞑靼人使用了另一种武器，所谓中国龙喷火器。

sentences.english: They are cruel killers, breathing fire and capturing women.
sentences.chinese: 他们是残忍的杀人魔鬼，能够喷火，还掠取妇女”。

sentences.english: He will rescue Princess Fiona from a dangerous, fire-breathing dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他将从一只危险的喷火龙手里救出费欧娜公主。

sentences.english: He will rescue Princess Fiona from a dangerous, fire-breathing 8)dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他将从一只危险的喷火龙手里救出费欧娜公主。

sentences.english: Human Torch - Ludwigs Flamethrower, Shoots fire and starts people a blaze (Bind key for power).
sentences.chinese: 人肉喷火器向敌人喷火，需绑定热键。

definition: to get angry/to burn with rage
spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out
to discharge smoke/to fume with rage
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
(onom.) beating of the heart/pitapat/pulsation of a machine
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
